snippet: Cleveland’s mayor, Frank Jackson, said Thursday that he disagreed with a blistering Justice Department report that found the city’s police department was riddled with problems.
abstract: Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson objects to blistering Justice Dept report that found city's police department is riddled with problems, including frequent use of excessive force.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland’s mayor, Frank Jackson, said Thursday that he disagreed with a blistering Justice Department report that found the city’s police department was riddled with problems.

headline.main: Ohio: Cleveland Mayor Contests Report on Police
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Cleveland Mayor Contests Report on Police
